messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Davinci. May I know your name, please?
Hi Davinci, my name is Ian.
Hi Ian, it's great to speak with you today. How can I assist you with your account?
I'm interested in learning more about the Gerber Goodstart Gentle Pro product. Can you help me with that?
Of course, Ian! Gerber Goodstart Gentle Pro is designed to be gentle on your baby's tummy. It includes probiotics and is inspired by breastmilk. Do you have any specific questions about the product?
That sounds great! I'm wondering if there are any special offers or discounts available for this product on my account?
Let me check that for you, Ian. Please hold on for a moment.
Thank you for waiting, Ian. I've checked your account, and it looks like there is a 10% discount available on your next purchase of Gerber Goodstart Gentle Pro.
That's awesome! How can I apply this discount to my order?
You can apply the discount at the checkout page by entering the promo code that I'll send to your registered email address. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all for now. Thanks a lot, Davinci! You've been very helpful.
You're welcome, Ian! Have a great day!
